body.name: Wrangler Astral Hardside Luggage, Hydro, 20-Inch Carry-On
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 6 mins
features: Enhanced Travel Experience: Stay organized and connected on the go with the built-in 3-in-1 cup holder, phone holder, and USB port in the back, allowing you to keep your beverages within reach, securely hold your phone, and charge your devices conveniently
Effortless Maneuverability: Enjoy smooth and easy navigation with the 360-degree 4-wheel system, allowing you to effortlessly glide through crowded airports and busy streets
Convenient Accessibility: The top and side carry handles provide multiple carrying options, making it convenient to lift and handle the luggage in different situations
Exceptional Durability: Crafted with a sturdy hardside shell, this luggage offers reliable protection for your belongings, ensuring they remain safe during your travels

Thoughtful Design: With its sleek and modern design, this carry-on luggage combines style and functionality, making it an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers seeking a reliable and fashionable travel companion
body.description: Introducing the Wrangler 20" Astral Smart Hardside Carry-On Luggage, the perfect companion for your travel adventures. Designed with convenience and style in mind, this carry-on luggage offers a seamless travel experience. Maneuvering through airports and crowded streets becomes effortless with the 360-degree 4-wheel system, allowing smooth and easy navigation. The top and side carry handles provide versatile carrying options, ensuring comfortable lifting and handling. But what sets this luggage apart is its smart features. Stay organized and connected on the go with the built-in 3-in-1 cup holder, phone holder, and USB port in the back. Keep your beverages close by, securely hold your phone for easy access, and conveniently charge your devices. Crafted with a durable hardside shell, this luggage offers exceptional protection for your belongings, giving you peace of mind throughout your journey. With its sleek and modern design, the Wrangler 20" Astral Smart Hardside Carry-On Luggage combines style and functionality, making it a must-have for any traveler seeking reliability and fashion-forward appeal. Embark on your next adventure with confidence, knowing that you have the perfect travel companion by your side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique Looking, Good Sized Carry On
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This carry on is a good size with the option to expand. While the exterior is a hard plastic it seems like it will be durable. The wheels are great and easily maneuverable on multiple surfaces. The telescopic handle seems flimsy but will see how it holds up. The interior is roomy and I love that it has the zippered pocket on top with plenty of packing space. You can unzip the bottom compartment to add and access your charging pack, it even has a small Velcro holder. The cupholder also seems a bit flimsy but is very easy to open and shut and I think it will be a great addition while traveling.Overall, I really like this carry on and am excited to use it for several upcoming trips.Will update my review after the first trip to see how it holds up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big on room and very cool looking.
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son who was traveling, and its great! Its more roomier than it looks, its got a nice hard shell and looks very cool. I may get one for myself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice piece of luggage. Nicely made and roomy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Came right on time for my flight the same week. Small, durable & cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light, spacious and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I've used this suitcase for a couple of trips and it has worked great, the cup handler comes in handy when you have much stuff and don't have a free hand to hold your coffee or drink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Should I or shouldn’t I?
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this product choosing filter of, “receive by tomorrow if you order in next …” I did.This suitcase came days after I’d returned from my trip. Don’t need it.Yet it’s so tough and light I'm considering keeping it! But hey! I’m not rich to have purchased now two suitcases!Kept it. Perfect weight etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Came in broken but I was desperate
reviews.reviewText: This would be a 5 star review had the straps inside not been popped when I opened it. But I was leaving for a trip the next day and had to use it so I sewed it best I could and made due.The ride is very smooth!! Cup holder is sturdy, easy to use in a rush etc. the only think I didn’t like was that the port for the charger is a usb….no phone used those anymore guys. Lol! But I love it other than that. The color is just like the picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Edit: it was fine. Dimensions a bit too large for AA, Delta...
reviews.reviewText: Edit: I've flown with AA, and two mexican budget airlines so far and had no issues.Original:It looks great, however, the description didn't specify the dimensions and I took a chance. Turns out overall dimensions are 21.5 x 14.5 x 9.5. So a bit bigger than several US airlines allow (22×14×9). I'm not sure if I'll keep it since I'm flying domestically. I'd hate to be told to check it in because of 0.5 inches...Edit: when I measure it myself, it is only the 9.5 that seems too large.. but if you don't fill it brimful, you can sort of squeeze the zipper area that's soft to make it a bit smaller, so I will take a chance. I can update when I have tried it 🛫

Biene en un color lila muy bonito, si tienes batería portátil la puedes conectar y trae su puerto de entrada y compartimiento para guardar la pila. Trae un cierre extra para que puedas expandir la maleta y te quepa un poco más de equipaje, en el porta vasos puedes poner tu celular, tu bebida o cargar tu celular. Hasta ahora todo bien.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wrangler Carry On Luggage Great price Solid Build
reviews.reviewText: Received this in time for a trip. Go ahead Airline try and wreck this! This is a solid build, and if it's anything like Wrangler jeans it's going to last a long time. Roomy spacious and no issue in theoverhead bin even when using the expansion capability. Really like this suitcase. Solid 5 star recommend!
Muy buen material. Llego a tiempo, resistente y bonita. Buena compra !

I bought this for a family vacation we are taking in a couple of months. It seems go roll nicely, has a very convenient cup holder and charge port. However you do have to buy your own power bank to use the charging port. Very roomy. The clip inside to hold your clothes is made of plastic, could have used a stronger material. I will see how this holds up after vacation and update.
